courseWork.title: Reference Group Influence
courseWork.description: Write a note on how different types of Reference Groups have influenced your choices, preferences and consumption, with an example from each of the four sub-types.
courseWork.descriptionHtml: Write a note on how different types of Reference Groups have influenced your choices, preferences and consumption, with an example from each of the four sub-types.

name.fullName: Ammar Ahmed BSDS 2020 FAST NU LHR

courseWork.title: Assignment # 2
courseWork.description:
You are required to conduct an in-depth macro-environment analysis of the Product/ Brand that you have chosen to work on as your course project. This is a group assignment, and will be treated as part of your term project.

Objective of this part of "Market Opportunity Analysis" is to identify the opportunities and threats that are being created for our business as a result of any major or minor changes, or expected changes, in any of the macro-environment factors. Please note that all elements of macro-environment might not be at play in any given industry. Only those that are relevant are to be identified, and their positive or  negative impacts are to be studied.
    
The facts and figures used to build your arguments must be supported with references from authentic sources. No "ifs" and "buts" please.

Inclusion and active participation of all group members is strongly suggested please.

comments.comment:
I hope this message finds you well.I want to seek 
your approval for our marketing project, which focuses on the Riyayat Discount App. App will provide customers latest discounts and sales offered by their favorite brands. 
Our target audience is the working classOur app's main competitor is the Savyour app. 
Essentialy Riyayat Discount App simplifies the shopping experience for customers by providing all discounts and sales in one place. 
I would appreciate 
your approval to proceed with it. 
(Detailed information was mailed to you earlier)
Ammar Ahmed (BDS-6A Marketing Management)
20L-0961

courseWork.title: Assignment # 1
courseWork.description:
Advertising & Public Relations are two of the five ways available for a Marketer to Promote his/ her Brand. What is common between the two is that both are Mass-mediated ways of communication. What's the difference between the two?

There is no minimum word count. Please try to write a precise, concise and to-the-point answer to the question without missing out on any important dimension. No need of unnecessarily dragging your answer.

Please keep the submission deadline in mind. Any late submissions will result in deduction of marks.

Best of luck!
